headline: Halliburton to provide umbilical-less installation services for Shell
summary: The agreement leverages Halliburton's ROCS, which was recently used in the GoM.

headline: Halliburton (HAL) Soars Following Q3 Report
summary: The share price of Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) surged by 19.22% between October 17 and October 24, 2025, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Gained the Most This Week. Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) is one of the largest providers of products and services to the energy industry in the world. Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) shot up after […]
